appSubDirectory.description: The subdirectory path for the AppSync bridge application
appSubDirectory.x-prompt: Specify the subdirectory for your AppSync bridge (will be placed in the applications directory)

graphqlSchemaLibrary.description: Library project containing the GraphQL schema (.graphql or .gql file)
graphqlSchemaLibrary.x-prompt: Which library contains the GraphQL schema?

authMode.description: Primary authentication mode for AppSync API

cognitoUserPoolStack.description: Project containing Cognito User Pool (required if authMode is COGNITO_USER_POOLS)

enableCaching.description: Enable AppSync caching for improved performance

cacheTtl.description: Cache TTL in seconds (only used if caching is enabled)

enableXray.description: Enable AWS X-Ray tracing for the AppSync API

enableCloudWatchLogs.description: Enable CloudWatch logging for field-level resolver execution

implicitDependencies.description: Additional projects this AppSync stack depends on (optional)
